contents.text: Welcome to Okta, the Identity Cloud experts in San Francisco, ensuring secure connections between people and technology.
For sales inquiries, product demos, and pricing details, press 1.
To speak with a sales representative, press 1.
Thank you for your interest in Okta. Please hold while we connect you to a sales representative.

navigationGoals: Get a fast pricing quote and purchasing details from a sales rep
I’m calling to get pricing details and ask about veteran nonprofit discounts on Okta’s identity solutions.
Connect me to a sales rep to discuss enterprise licensing and integration pricing.
I’d like someone to explain your service pricing and options to me.
I want to speak with a sales representative about pricing and licensing options for our university research group.

contents.text: To request a product demonstration and personalized walkthrough, press 2.
One moment please. Our specialists will be with you shortly to schedule your demo.

navigationGoals: Schedule a personalized Okta product demo this week
I’d like to schedule a personalized product demo that shows how Okta can secure our veteran support organization’s user logins.
I need to schedule a personalized demo of Okta’s identity governance and API management features.
Could I schedule a personalized demonstration so I can see how this works?
I’d like to schedule a personalized product demonstration of Okta’s features for my academic projects.

contents.text: For service status or technical support, press 2.
For current service status and incident reports, press 1.
Please hold to receive the latest service status from our network operations center.

navigationGoals: Retrieve the current Okta service status and incident report
I need to check if there’s a current service outage affecting our Okta-managed login portal.
I want to check the current service status and any active incident reports for Okta’s network operations.
I need to check if your system is currently down or experiencing issues.
I need to get the latest service status and any current incident reports for Okta’s platform.

contents.text: For technical support and troubleshooting assistance, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to a technical support engineer.

navigationGoals: Connect immediately with a support engineer to troubleshoot an issue
I need help troubleshooting a multi-factor authentication error that’s preventing me from logging into Okta.
I need help troubleshooting an OAuth2.0 authentication integration failure with Okta.
I’m having trouble logging in and need technical support assistance.
I need technical support to troubleshoot an authentication issue I’m encountering.
